extendedInfo.description: Havenât you ever wondered why canât science be as fun as a game of cricket or your favorite TV show? Well, we did. And the result is FUN-DO SCIENCE. A magical box that will set you on an adventure into the unknown. That will help your children unravel the mystery of scientific concepts and use them to build everything from bugs to planes to guns. FunDo Science is an app that helps your children build amazing things from wonder mixer to jitter bugs, from ball tornadoes to band guns, apply the theories from your text books such as centre of gravity and air resistance and learn the concepts not by memory, but by understanding its application in real life. If you are excited by what you, you can buy this magical box and use the app to build models right at your home or sign up for a fundo science summer camp near your home. For more information, refer to http://www.fundoscience.com/ Features â¢Storyboards to build models â¢Concepts explained with real-life connections Age-Group â¢Alpha Kit for children of age group of 5-9 years. â¢Beta Kit for children of age group of 10-13 years.
